title:
We create dreams for the future.
We realize them sucessfully.
desc: You know that you found your dream when you have a desire to achieve a goal, have the gut to pursue it, have the courage to overcome any obstacles on your path and feel blessed when finally realizing it. Dream on, keep up and make it pay off.

histories.title: The Foundation of Xubisoft
histories.desc: The beginning of Xubisoft was a plan of 3 people. We started our journey in a rented apartment. We were giving Website development service and graphics design at first to get some trusted clients.

histories.title: Became Xubisoft Ltd.
histories.desc: We Registered our company and incorporated in Bangladesh. We created new oppurtunities for job seekers and also incresed our service ares. It was like a golden age of Xubisoft Ltd.

histories.title: Our Turning Point
histories.desc: The company has a turning point when we have finished some working deal with government projects. We started to develop manpower in ICT sector and giving full stack services to our customer. We expanded our branch this year.
